greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of the continued fraction for floor(Fibonacci(n)*(1+sqrt(5))/2) / Fibonacci(n).
comment: A240828 is an essentially identical sequence. - _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 18 2014
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
formula: a(1)=a(2)=1, for k>=2 we have a(2k)=2*floor(k/2) and a(2k-1)=2*k-2.
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Feb 15 2011
